text: I went to join this beta today in one of my portals but I did not see the option in the product updates is this beta still available? Or is it just under a different name or something?
In case any HubSpot employees are reading this and can just turn the beta on from their side the portal is: 23361624

*A bug and a few suggestions*

1. When using `<Heading inline={true}>` inside of `<Tile>` the text is still wrapping to a new line when the documentation states that it should prevent the line from wrapping. _(Fixed this but might still be a bug, it was in a single tile object but I still needed to set the Flex container to display="column" for some reason?)_
2. There really needs to be a padding and margin system of some kind. It's hard to make some stuff look good with just flex, box and tile; as you can see here.
3. Adding a bold option and heading sizes to the `<Heading>` widget would be very useful and allow users to have better typography.
4. Allowing a use to center the title on a card
I've tried without using <Text></Text> inside of the heading as well to no avail
This seems to be the case for me as well, just tried to find the beta on a developer test account
